description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. BULKHEAD Survival is an action packed survival FPS for single player and multiplayer online co-op. How long can you survive against the increasingly skilled AI opponents?
description.short: BULKHEAD Survival is an action packed survival FPS for single player and multiplayer online co-op. How long can you survive against the increasingly skilled AI opponents?
